alert.note: Alert for Rogers (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 27 at 5:25PM CDT until July 27 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CDT FOR WEST CENTRAL ROGERS...NORTHEASTERN CREEK AND NORTHEASTERN TULSA COUNTIES... At 524 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Tulsa, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations in or near the path include... Tulsa... Broken Arrow... Sand Springs... Owasso... Bixby... Jenks... Catoosa... Collinsville... Turley... Tulsa International Airport... Jenks Riverside Airport... Gray... This includes Interstate 44 between mile markers 212 and 235. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
